subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
Suits and Litigation
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A jury acquitted the former Yankee Jim Leyritz of D.U.I. manslaughter after days of testimony that centered on whether he ran a red light before a 2007 crash.
snippet: A jury acquitted the former Yankee Jim Leyritz of D.U.I. manslaughter after days of testimony that centered on whether he ran a red light before a 2007 crash.
